clients

Class ScenarioClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • clients.ScenarioClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class ScenarioClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client
    the client used to execute a ScenarioRequest and also can be single instated to handle a class extends Scenario
    Author:
    zhangyutao

      • execute

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,ScenarioResult> execute(Scenario scenario,
                                                                   ScenarioIO[] inputDatas,
                                                                   int iteration,
                                                                   boolean isConcurrent,
                                                                   int timeout)
        Execute the given Scenario
        Parameters:
        scenario - the Scenario class which you want to execute.
        inputDatas - the data you would use to execute the scenario.
        iteration - the number how many times you would to repeate on the scenario.the 1 means only run one time.
        isConcurrent - whether start the scenario concurrently.
        timeout - the timeout for execute one scenario.it is in milliseconds
        Returns:
